thread.title: Bradley Cooper's Limitless spinoff show gets a full season order at CBS
thread.title_full: Bradley Cooper's Limitless spinoff show gets a full season order at CBS

title: Bradley Cooper's Limitless spinoff show gets a full season order at CBS
text:
Saturday, Oct 24 2015, 09:02   Twitter Share on Google+ The TV spinoff of Bradley Cooper 's hit film Limitless has been given a 22-episode season order at CBS.The star serves as an executive producer for the series and his film character Senator Eddie Morra features in a recurring role to further the storyline for the new leading man, Jake McDorman. 
Â© CBS / Jeff Neumann McDorman stars as Brian Finch, a slacker musician who is forced into solving cases for the FBI using enhanced abilities acquired from taking the mysterious NZT drug."We're excited how Limitless continues to evolve creatively each week and stand out with its unique style of storyelling," Glenn Geller, CBS Entertainment President, said in a statement. "It's off to a strong start in a highly competitive environment."Sky Living has recently picked up the show in the UK , though no premiere date has been set. Limitless airs Tuesdays at 10pm ET on CBS in the US.
